TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StatusBar extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 代表在應用程式視窗的水平列中顯示項目與資訊的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that displays items and information in a horizontal bar in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. A是一列，通常會顯示映像和狀態資訊的水平列。A is a bar that typically displays a horizontal row of images and status information. 您可以將分割中的項目分成群組相關的項目，使用控制項。You can divide the items in a into groups that contain related items, by using controls. 中的項目可以顯示文字、 圖形或其他複雜的內容。The items in a can display text, graphics, or other complex content. 中的項目定義為物件。Items in a are defined as objects. 事件上定義之使用者按一下中的項目時，會引發。Events that are defined on a are raised when the user clicks the item in the . 不接收鍵盤焦點。The does not receive keyboard focus. 下圖顯示的範例。The following illustration shows an example of a . **狀態列****Status Bar** ![狀態列](~/add/media/ss-ctl-statusbar.GIF "狀態列")![Status bar](~/add/media/ss-ctl-statusbar.GIF "Status bar") ## 自訂 StatusBar 控制項Customizing the StatusBar Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[StatusBar 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/statusbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [StatusBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/statusbar-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立。The following example creates a . [!code-xaml[StatusBar_Snips#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StatusBar_Snips/CS/Window1.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用選擇不同的項目容器，如果在集合中的項目是相同的型別，而且您必須提供自訂邏輯以選擇的項目容器。Use an to choose different item containers if the items in your collection are the same type and you need to provide custom logic to choose the item container. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出功能表是否會根據基礎集合中的項目類型或其他啟發學習法，選取不同的項目容器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.

value.span: 如果功能表會選取不同的項目容器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, .
The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性相當實用，如果您想要建立繫結至集合的功能表。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. 項目容器會顯示物件集合中的 UI 項目。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果您想要繫結至集合，若要建立包含功能表物件和物件，設定屬性設為 true，並建立每種類型的集合中的物件。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每個必須包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
